data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is part of a suite of tools to manipulate a new scientific
    data standard, MAGE, accepted by the Object Management Group, OMG,
    this year. The entire suite, MAGEstk, is available at mged.sf.net.

    This suite of tools has been in development for over a year, and is
    used by researchers around the world. It would be more convenient
    for people to download it directly from CPAN.
